entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 6:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

Temperature: 3.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
